name: audio-metadata-extractor
title: Audio Metadata Extractor
description: Extract ID3 tags, artist, album info, and other metadata from audio files
content:
Overview

This application extracts comprehensive metadata from audio files including ID3 tags, artist information, album details, and technical properties. Built using mutagen, it supports a wide range of audio formats and metadata standards.

Features

  • Extract ID3 tags from MP3 files
  • Extract metadata from various audio formats (MP3, FLAC, OGG, M4A, etc.)
  • Retrieve artist, album, title, and genre information
  • Extract technical properties (bitrate, sample rate, duration, channels)
  • Export metadata to JSON format for easy parsing

Parameters

  • Input Audio: Upload your audio file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Extracted Information

The application extracts:

  • File Info: Filename, format, size, duration
  • Audio Properties: Bitrate, sample rate, channels
  • Tags: Title, artist, album, album artist, date, genre, track number, composer, copyright, and more

Output

The application generates a JSON file containing all extracted metadata with the filename ending in "_metadata.json" in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Cataloging audio file collections
  • Verifying audio file metadata
  • Extracting information for music library management
  • Analyzing audio file properties
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/audio_metadata_extractor.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
